ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 67. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
